attributes.action: keep the 10p minimum tax rate - don't introduce measures that leave the masses in messes !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
About 5 m people will be affected by the abolition of the 10p tax rate.

If, in the P.M.'s own words, Labour is about

"Creating opportunity for everyone, not opportunism in everything", 

then the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to justify the new tax changes understandably outside of political rhetoric.

Measures affecting masses of population, leaving them in a mess financially should not be introduced without proper consultation and cost benefit analysis to ensure ethically the greatest happiness of the greatest number and financially, doing no harm.

Presumably, the 10 p rate was there for a legitimate reason - the bottom line of the Welfare State's safety net.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
